    • Method Detail

      • verifyDefence

        public static boolean verifyDefence(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> policy,
                    java.util.ArrayList<Node> nodes)
        verifyDefence is the method which checks if the policy proposed by the System Admin is indeed a valid Defense Policy
        Parameters:
        policy - is an ArrayList of type String which takes in the names of the nodes which need to be negated as proposed by the System Admin
        nodes - is an ArrayList of type Node, which contains the list of all nodes in the Tree/Graph
        Returns:
        true if the passed policy is indeed a valid policy, else return false

      • verify

        public boolean verify(Node root,
             java.util.Set<java.lang.String> assignment,
             java.util.ArrayList<Node> nodes)
               throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        verify is a method which checks if the assignment returned by the Preference Reasoner is indeed a valid policy from attacker perspective. It looks at each Exploit (Type 2) as a conjunction of Leaves (Type 0) and Privileges (Type 1)
        Parameters:
        root - of type Node is the root node of the Tree/Graph
        assignment - is a Set of type String which contains the set of assignment to verify, if root node can be compromised
        nodes - is an ArrayList of type Node which contains the list of all nodes in the Tree/Graph
        Returns:
        true if the assignment can satisfy the root, else returns false
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException
